title: The 10 Best Movies of 2022 … So Far
description:
Sean invites an all-star cast of Ringer contributors to share their favorite movies of the year.

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guests: Rob Harvilla, Charles Holmes, Van Lathan, Rob Mahoney, Adam Nayman, Joanna Robinson, Mallory Rubin, Chris Ryan
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
